## Meeting Schedule

**When**: Thursday's at noon, Spring 2017

**Who**: R enthusiasts, beginngers through advanced 

**Where**: Workshop Room, The /Edge, Bostock Library

```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)

rfun_table <- read_csv('https://github.com/data-and-visualization/blogdown2-rfun/raw/master/static/data/data.csv')
```


```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
rfun_table %>% 
  mutate(present2 = paste0("<a href='", PresenterURL, "'>", 
                           Presenter, "</a>")) %>%
  mutate(topic2 = paste0("<a href='", TopicURL, "'>", 
                         Topic, "</a>")) %>% 
  mutate(vid2 = if_else(Video != "NA", 
                        paste0("<a href='", VideoURL, "'>", 
                               Video, "</a>"), 
                        "do not print", " ")) %>% 
  mutate(file2 = if_else(Files != "NA", 
                         paste0("<a href='", FilesURL, "'>", 
                                Files, "</a>"),
                         "do not print", " ")) %>% 
  select(Topic = topic2, Presenter = present2, Video = vid2, Files = file2) %>% 
  knitr::kable()

```
